tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Yatin is so friendly, patient and willing to listen to your problems in detail. He takes time to understand problems and then makes the patient understand what‚Äôs going on. He was so nice that he even sat me down and went through all the flagged abnormalities in my medical reports line by line and explained what it meant l. He even grabbed pen & paper to describe some vital body organs function and the corrective impact medicines can have on them. Highly recommended !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Preventive care of Heart& Lung diseases,
review: Very good doctor . Always treat his patients very nicely and gives good explanation and can be approached very easily as his response is quick

tags: None
review: Had an amazing experience consulting Dr. Kukreja. He explained everything related to my reports in detail. Answered all my questions with patience and depth. I have been going through some mental health issues too and he was quite understanding and respectful of that and took it into consideration, without being dismissive of their role in my issue and it's treatment. I am continuing my treatment with him and so far, while I dont know end results of what would happen health wise, having a calm, good and understanding doctor is a plus to put any patient at immediate easy and ready to tackle their health issue with a Positive attitude. A plus I would add is he gives printed out, detailed prescriptions, which are easy to read and understand. Dont need a chemist help to read the prescription, and it also mentions the composition of medicines prescribed which is an indication of total transparency as well as I can use if i want to look for a medicine of alternative brand with similar composition. Excellent doctor and staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very nice. The doctor explained each and every issue thoroughly and intently heard my problems and gave solutions thereto.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have an issue with the whole modus operandi of the doctor. I visited the doctor probably more than a year ago. I faced the same issue that time. Today, i had no choice but to visit his clinic for my wife's throat infection due to non availability of our family doctor and he being the nearest one. The issue is that he prescribes only those medicines which you ll find availabile with him at his clinic. ***** ** ****** ***** *** *********** ********* *** as a patient, your first intent is obviously to get the same med as prescribed by the doc. While we were prescribed certain medicines, we roamed for half an hour to find those medicines but to no avail. We had no choice but to come back to his clinic. However, we intend to not visit his clinic anytime now. Firstly, a doctor simultaneously operating a clinic from the same place* ** **** *** * ***** **** ** ********* ******** ** ********* ********* *** *** ****** ** ****** * ******** ******* ******* *** ** *** ********* **** **** Further, he will ****** suggests certain 4-5 ******** tests, although I cannot comment on the need of those tests but as soon as the billing is done, you will hear offers to get these lab tests done at so call nominal rates* ******* ******* **** **** **** *** *** **** ***** *** ***** ******** ** ***** * ********* **** **** **** ************ ****** ** ************

tags: None
review: He is very nice in nature and a knowledgeable doctor. I loved the way he handled my issue and the advice he gave me. Got compeltely well in 1 and a half week.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Firstly, I booked a video consultation with the doctor but he wasn't willing to start a video call and kept texting instead. He did finally agree and asked me to get some tests done, after which he would prescribe the required medication. I also ended up booking an appointment for my brother to had similar symptoms and was asked to follow the same steps. When the reports arrived, I shared them with him immediately. However, it has been a day and I haven't received any response from the doctor whatsoever. 
It is an absolute futile effort and does not justify spending all that money if I cannot even get a follow up, which is absolutely necessary.
reply_text:
Good Morning, 
I haven't recieved your report as yet. 

Your brother, did send me his report, to which I had responded. No response from him since then.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor is very patient and will listen to the entire problem very patiently and will quality time which you would defenitely not find in majority of doctors. He could rule
Out the complete problem in one visit and recommended
The right treatment.Fortunately coz of which the patient was given right treatment at the apt time before the case could have gone worse.He also shows concern abt the patients And i felt he is doing this beyond his basic duty which I really liked abt him.so we can still say that even now in this world we have doctors who r not just not working for duty  and have human values
Post our treatment 2 of our other family members visited and have recommended the doctor already to few of our known people

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
He is extremely kind. He opened his clinic on a Sunday just because I called and panicked about an infection, which he believed needed urgent attention. He is also very patient, polite and gives ample time to hear a patient‚Äôs queries. These qualities are rare today. 
I have also visited him earlier with other troubles, and each time, he has only outdone my expectations from a doctor‚Äôs visit. 
Dr Kukreja is a most reliable family physician who is a doctor by passion not just by profession ‚Äî this is amply reflected each time you visit him.

review: This is not the first time that I have visited Dr. Kukreja. We had consulted him thrice. We are satisfied with all the consultation. He has such calm nature and friendly and explained us the treatment so well. Charges are reasonable. Once in peak days of covid all other doctors had advised us to admit my uncle to some hospital, Dr. Yatin prescribed few medicines which were so good that my uncle was able to go to work in just 3-4 days. And this time considering my mom's condition, I thought I would have to admit her in some hospital but Dr. Yatin treated her in the clinic and she is better now.
